home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to Trackr, a platform to manage and view race results.

about.title: About
about.description: Trackr is an application that allows users to add races, sessions and results. It also tracks the standings, based on the point system used.
about.developedBy: Trackr is developed by Dick Wolff.
about.reportBugs: Found a bug? Report it on Github!

search.title: Search
search.hintDetail: Start typing to search, e.g. OTKC
search.noResults: No championships found for this query.

championship.noSessions: There hasn't been a session yet.
championship.noStandings: There are no standings** because there hasn't been a race yet.

races.title: Races
races.description: View the races, and their individual results.

session.title: Session results
session.description: The table below shows the results of the session.

standings.title: Standings
standings.description: The table below shows the current standings of the championship.
